project_plan.name: Random Password Generator in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password including uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The length of the password should be configurable by the user.

task.name: Allow user input for password length
Include functionality for selecting character types (uppercase, lowercase, numbers, special characters)
Write tests for the password generation functionality
Execute tests to ensure the password meets the specified requirements and is random
